AI Document Assistant

## Give Providers Back One Day Per Week

Request a Demo

#

The first and only Artificial Intelligence documentation tool for Human
Services

The Bells Digital Assistant is designed to make the documentation process
faster, easier and higher quality for behavioral health, addiction treatment,
child and family services, IDD, autism and direct service providers.

Our artificial intelligence (AI) technology alleviates pain points to enable
faster onboarding, staff retention and recruitment, reduce documentation time,
enable concise clinical documentation, drive adherence and engagement in care
plans and maximizes reimbursements.

**Save up to 50% on documentation time, giving you more time with the
individuals you serve.**

### See Bells in action and better support your staff through documentation
ease of use once and for all.

Request a Demo Now

### Bells enhances the EHR to:

  * Enable consistency across service providers and multiple offices
  * Increase job satisfaction
  * Eliminate common errors proactively and reduce multiple rounds of reviews
  * Decrease time from session to claim to payments
  * Reduce staff turnover
  * Add clients and increase revenue

###

**Assisted Data Capture** enables you to go from mobile to desktop seamlessly.
You can choose from a template, type your notes, capture notes via a photo,
use voice to text and utilize quick text features.

###

**Data accuracy** assists with contextual recommendations for compliance and
reimbursement, proofing grammar and spelling, checking clinical vocabulary,
leveraging the user dictionary and fast-check treatment notes

###

**Contextual Recommendation Engine** provides clinical support, sets up
keywords, includes must-have blocks of texts and optimizes billing codes.

### Want Bells to join your team?

Click to read her resume and check out her credentials.

+ 67 %

**average note**  
writing speed

+ 84 %

**average time  
gained** from  
session to sign

2.2

**days faster**  
reimbursement  
submission

+ 16 %

**average claims**  
per Direct Support  
Provider (DSP)

5.2

**hours saved**  
per staff  
per week

##  How can Bells AI technology boost your ROI?

Faster and more accurate notes. Fewer rejected claims. Better retention and
recruitment. It all adds up.

How many people are in your organization?

Staff needed to break even

4

Hours of work saved each month

2,100

Total revenue saved each month

$42,000

_*ROI is an estimate. Actual results may vary._

##  Want to see Bells in action?

Get ready to increase productivity by 50% while your clinicians focus on
providing care.  Request a Demo

## What does it mean for you?

### Clinical Impact

#### Increase Access to Care

Help more people with increase staff capacity

#### Improved Ramp Time

Faster ramp time for service providers doing clinical documentation

#### Better Moral + Less Turnover

Easier note-taking helps employee satisfaction

#### Less QA Headache

Catching errors on the front-end leads to less back-and-forth with QA and
service providers



### Financial Impact

#### More Revenue

See 6 more clients per week per DSP

#### Payroll Savings

Save 21 hours per month per service provider

#### Faster Cash Flow

Cut 1-2 days off payer reimbursement cycle

#### Reduced Risk of Recoupment

Better notes reduce the risk of recoupment

## Learn More

##  White Paper: Improving Clinical Documentation Processes by Incorporating
New Technology

Discover how artificial intelligence is improving staff retention, maximizing
reimbursement, and improving clinical care.  Download Now

##  Brochure: Bells - The First and Only AI-Powered Virtual Assistant for the
EHR

Learn how AI is alleviating key pain points with this bolt-on solution to your
existing EHR.  Download Now

##  Webinar: Retain Staff, Maximize Revenue, Drive Outcomes

In this presentation, learn the results of OPEN MINDS' National Study on
Clinical Documentation & Technology  Watch Now

##  Webinar: Advancements That Attract - Using Technology to Support Your
Workforce

Learn about cutting-edge advancements that can position your organization as a
leader in human services and among your number one resource - the provider.
Watch Now

##  MHASCK Harnesses the Power of Artificial Intelligence to Ease Clinical
Documentation Burden on Staff

See how MHASCK was able to cut documentation time by almost 50% by investing
in Bells AI.  Download Now

##  Press Release: Netsmart Accelerates AI Healthcare Technology Innovations

Netsmart acquired Remarkable Health, include the CT|One electronic health
record and Bells, the virtual assistant.  Learn More

###

"I am going to see more people because my notes aren't as difficult, and we're
going to capture more of my experiences that are billing."

_– Bailey, Clinical Liason_

### For current clients, download the Bells AI Assistant for your device

**Clickhere for Mac Version**

**Clickhere for Google Play Version**

### Ready to learn more?

See Bells in action and better support your staff through documentation ease
of use once and for all.

Request a Demo Now

800.842.1973

11100 Nall Ave  
Overland Park, KS 66211
